entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -40.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 2:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -40.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -45.2°C
Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 40.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 39.
